casebody.data:
No. 10-1049. John Larson and Robert Pfaff, Petitioners v. United States. 564 U.S. 1046, 131 S. Ct. 3059,

180 L. Ed. 2d 902,

2011 U.S. LEXIS 4922. June 27, 2011.

Petition for writ of cer-tiorari to the United States Court of *903Appeals for the Second Circuit denied.

Justice Sotomayor took no part in the consideration or decision of this petition.

Same case below, 407 Fed. Appx. 506.
